com.adidas.ui.validator.guide

Interface Guide<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - value type
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AddressGuide, AddressStateGuide, AgeGuide, CardNumberGuide, CreditCardExpiryDateGuide, CVVInputGuide, DEPostalCodeGuide, EmailGuide, ESPostalCodeGuide, FRPostalCodeGuide, MandatoryFieldGuide, ManualActivationGuide, NameGuide, PersonNameGuide, PhoneGuide, PostalCodeGuide, UKPostalCodeGuide, USPostalCodeGuide, ValidatorsSetGuide

    public interface Guide<T>
    Guidance text generator. Returns results as ValidationResult. Based on Validator;

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ValidationResult guide(T value)
      Generate guidance text for the provided input.
